guides.title: Basic SELECT Statements
guides.content: The SELECT statement is used to select data from a database. Syntax: SELECT column1, column2 FROM table_name;

guides.title: WHERE Clause
guides.content: The WHERE clause is used to filter records. Syntax: SELECT column1, column2 FROM table_name WHERE condition;

guides.title: INSERT INTO Statement
guides.content: The INSERT INTO statement is used to insert new records into a table. Syntax: INSERT INTO table_name (column1, column2) VALUES (value1, value2);

guides.title: UPDATE Statement
guides.content: The UPDATE statement is used to modify existing records in a table. Syntax: UPDATE table_name SET column1 = value1 WHERE condition;

guides.title: DELETE Statement
guides.content: The DELETE statement is used to delete records from a table. Syntax: DELETE FROM table_name WHERE condition;
